  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2889</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Media and gender Equality</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Media und die Geschlecht Gleichheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les medias et l'égalité de genre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os media e a igualdade do gender</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I media e l'uguaglianza di genere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το MEDIA και η ισότητα γένους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los media y la igualdad del género</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit which looks at the influence of the media on stereotypes and gender equality.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stereotypes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gender</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">media</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit, die den 
Einfluß der Media auf Stereotypen und Geschlechtgleichheit 
betrachtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive qui regarde 
l'influence des medias sur des stéréotypes et l'égalité de genre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa que olhe a 
influência dos media em stereotypes e em igualdade do gender.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva che guarda 
l'influenza dei media sugli stereotipi e sull'uguaglianza di genere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα που 
εξετάζει την επιρροή των μέσων στα στερεότυπα και την ισότητα 
γένους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva que mira la 
influencia de los media en estereotipos e igualdad del género.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stereotypen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
